#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType StrokePrecision.

== Name ==

*[CStrokePrecision StrokePrecision]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--StrokePrecision (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Elements to quantify the precision and quality of a stroke in two directions:
			Front/Back for stroke length, and Left/Right for stroke direction.
			Elements values are constrained between -2 and +2.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  type = xs:string>  ([SStrokePrecisionValue front-back], [SStrokePrecisionValue left-right]  )?</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [SStrokePrecisionValue golfml:StrokePrecisionValue] || [SStrokePrecisionValue front-back] ||  					Precision of a stroke relative to the distance.				 ||
|| [SStrokePrecisionValue golfml:StrokePrecisionValue] || [SStrokePrecisionValue left-right] ||  					Precision of a stroke relative to the direction.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| type ||   || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CStrokeDetail StrokeDetail]
----
    <xs:complexType name="StrokePrecision">  <xs:sequence minOccurs="0">    <xs:element name="front-back" type="golfml:StrokePrecisionValue">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="left-right" type="golfml:StrokePrecisionValue">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence>  <xs:attribute name="type" type="xs:string"/></xs:complexType>
----
